title: The Death of Allegory thought in a coat

content.question: Which of the following best describes the function of the conceit in “a thought in a coat” (line 7)?

choices.label: It echoes the speaker’s rambling process of reasoning in the poem as a whole.
It underscores the speaker’s insistence upon the need for moral messages in modern art.
It illustrates the speaker’s distrust of ideas masquerading as individuals from human history.
It reinforces the speaker’s celebration of how artists bestowed physical form on abstractions.

content.answer: It reinforces the speaker’s celebration of how artists bestowed physical form on abstractions.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
